ul.li: Practicum is a kind of ProviderEducation
FormalEducation is a kind of ProviderEducation

section.title: Description
section.p: Represents information about the educational experience of an Individual Healthcare Provider. This includes both formal training resulting in some sort of degree or certification, as well as practical experience such as an internship. See Section 2 of the CAQH Provider Application.

stentry.p: Contains the dates (start and end) during which the provider's education took place.
